name: Lion the Cat Wizard
description:
Lion lives in cat land, the likes of which has been ravaged by the dog wizard, Canis Magicae. Under the supervision of his familiar, he decides to go around and get enough cat power to defeat the dog wizard!

Made with tyranobuilder, art and assets by me, font by Pixel Sagas.

1.1 update, there was an oversight with the audio, it wouldn't stop playing when you returned to the title screen

1.2 update, adds battle music!

2.1 update, new format! new title screen! added cat health and Lion health UI to batle! i took off the load game and menu stuff cuz it's not really necessary, plus the menu stuff just clipped off the screen so it's wasn't really practical
